message: Hey Bob, I have a product that I think you'd be really interested in. I'm asking for $115 for it, which is a great deal considering its value. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  $90 is a bit too low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $105. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're interested.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking $95 would be a more reasonable price for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I'm not willing to go any higher than that.
